sharpes %>%
  dygraphs::dygraph(width = "100%") %>% 
  dygraphs::dyEvent(
    x     = "2022-02-24", 
    label = paste0("RUS-UKR Conflict", paste0(rep(" ", 30), collapse = "")), 
    color = "yellow",
    strokePattern = "solid"
  ) %>%
  dygraphs::dyOptions(
    strokeWidth            = 3,
    drawPoints             = TRUE, 
    pointSize              = 4,
    connectSeparatedPoints = TRUE
  ) %>%
  dygraphs::dyAxis(
    "y", 
    label             = "Sharpe Ratio",
    logscale          = TRUE,
    axisLabelFontSize = 16,
    axisLabelColor    = "#FFD960",
    axisLineWidth     = 3,
    axisLineColor     = "#E89923",
  ) %>%
  dygraphs::dyAxis(
    "x", 
    axisLabelFontSize = 16,
    axisLabelColor    = "#FFD960",
    axisLineWidth     = 3,
    axisLineColor     = "#E89923"
  ) %>%
  dygraphs::dyLegend(labelsDiv = "top-sharpes-legend") %>% 
  dygraphs::dyRangeSelector(height = 50, strokeColor = "") %>% {
    shiny::tagList(
      shiny::fluidRow(
        shiny::p("Mouse over the figure below for trader-level data."),
        shiny::p("Use the range selector to zoom in on a particular area."),
        style = "text-align:center;"
      ),
      shiny::fluidRow(
        id    = "top-sharpes-legend",
        class = "dylegend-div"
      ),
      shiny::fluidRow(
        shiny::column(width = 12, . )  
      )
    ) 
  }
